help.name: mri_fill
help.description: This program creates hemispheric cutting planes and fills white matter with specific values for subsequent surface tesselation.

optional_flagged.explanation: use xform dst offset to get an accurate Talairach volume
aseg volume used to perform fill
specify atlas to use for auto-filling
optional_flagged.intro: Seed point options in Talairach coordinates
optional_flagged.explanation: Talairach coords of the seed for the corpus callosum
Talairach coords of the seed for the pons
Talairach coords of the white matter seed for the left hemisphere
Talairach coords of the white matter seed for the right hemisphere
optional_flagged.intro: Alternative seed point options in voxel coordinates
optional_flagged.explanation: voxel coords of the seed for the corpus callosum
voxel coords of the seed for the pons

outputs.explanation: The filled volume for the cortical reconstruction- used for subsequent surface tesselation.

help.example:
mri_fill SUBJECT/mri/wm/. SUBJECT/mri/filled
Takes a subjects wm volume as input and uses this to find cutting planes to seperate the hemispheres and remove the brainstem, and fills hemispheres with specific values as filled volume output.
